sentences.sContent: In remote mountain areas, voters arrived on horseback.
sentences.sCn: 在偏远山区，选民们是骑着马来的。

sentences.sContent: Many people in this area ride horseback.
sentences.sCn: 这个地区有很多人骑马。

synos.tran: 性急的；草率的；未经充分考虑的

trans.tranOther: If you do something on horseback, you do it while riding a horse

trans.tranCn: 性急的；草率的；未经充分考虑的
